wikipedia_page.main: Ian MacDonald Robertson (30 October 1912 – 21 July 2005) was a Scottish High Court of Justiciary judge who contributed greatly to Scots law.

response: *Ian Robertson, Lord Robertson (1912–2005) TD, Senator of the College of Justice in Scotland, 1966–1987, chairman of the Merchiston Board of governors, 1970–1996
** Ian Robertson, Lord Robertson, Scottish judge (born 1912)
* Ian Robertson, Lord Robertson (1912–2005), Senator of the College of Justice in Scotland
* 30 October – Ian Robertson, Lord Robertson, judge (died 2005)
His brother was Ian Robertson, Lord Robertson, whose daughter Sally married Nick Kuenssberg . His great-niece Laura Kuenssberg is a journalist.
